quote: Men should only believe half of what women say. But which half?
author: Jean Giraudoux

quote: Yes, I don't believe that the inter-Korean relationship has, quote, 'deteriorated' since I assumed office. Rather I believe that the relationship between the two Koreas is entering into a new phase - a time of transition. And so I think that the North Koreans are trying to see what they can build with this, with my new administration.
author: Lee Myung-bak

quote: I couldn't be in a relationship and behave like somebody else or pretend I felt something I didn't feel. And that includes saying things I thought might jeopardize the relationship.
author: Kenny Loggins

quote: There's no shortage of orphans in 19th-century literature, but it's hard to find a single happy, communicative, functional parental relationship in the whole of 'Great Expectations,' even among the minor characters.
author: David Nicholls

quote: I don't know if there is a 'lack' of good black men. But when you haven't taken the time to get to know yourself, be OK with you, and articulate what it is you want in a relationship, then you can't possibly find that person for you because you don't even know what you're looking for.
author: Keshia Knight Pulliam

quote: My ideal relationship with the reader is that at certain points they will have said, 'I'm finding this quite tough, but I'm going to hang in there,' then at the end they will say, 'Oh God, I'm glad I hung on, it was so worth it.'
author: Sebastian Faulks

quote: We all have something about ourselves that we'd change if we could in a perfect world, be it our body image, our financial status, our relationship, whatever. I wanted to talk about how nobody's exempted from the realities of life and all those things.
author: Keri Hilson

quote: I am not possessive at all. In every relationship I have had, the girl has left me. And the fundamental complaint has been that I am self-contained. I am just comfortable with myself and am always on an adventure.
author: Shekhar Kapur

quote: Every relationship I've been in becomes long-distance because of work. It's never worked out. It puts an intense strain on the relationship, and at a certain point, it becomes too difficult.
author: Anton Yelchin

quote: If a relationship is founded on love it doesn't end.
author: Rosanne Cash

quote: I always felt sorry for the sidekick as a kid. They never got their due and it left a very bad taste in the mouth - they are defined by a subordinate relationship to someone else. I always felt like a bit of sidekick when I was a kid and it didn't feel fair.
author: China Mieville

quote: The grief of losing my father has come in waves over the years, as it does with most people. His love and devotion as a father provided my closest, most intimate relationship. Dad, and our time together, is in my bones. While reflecting on him, the memories themselves seem to boil down into certain 'essences of Dad.'
author: Jennifer Grant

quote: What I learned from directing, I learned from soccer, where it's like a coach-player relationship.
author: Sean Durkin

quote: The Thames could be thought of as England's longest archaeological site, and no fewer than 90,000 objects recovered from its foreshore are in the collection of the Museum of London, whose 30-year relationship with London mudlarks is both committed and highly regulated.
author: Jean Hanff Korelitz

quote: When I sit down to write a novel, I am exploring my own relationship with God, with the struggle between good and evil, my own purpose.
author: Ted Dekker

quote: The value of government to the people it serves is in direct relationship to the interest citizens themselves display in the affairs of state.
author: William Scranton

quote: The relationship with the words someone uses is more intimate and integrated than just a quick read and a blurb can ever be. This intimacy - the words on the page being sent back and forth from engaged editor to open author - is unique in my experience.
author: Alice Sebold

quote: And harmony means that the relationship between all the elements used in a composition is balanced, is good.
author: Karlheinz Stockhausen

quote: A Bush Administration will, I believe, enjoy a better relationship with the new Congress, although President-elect Bush will be faced with real challenges in getting along with the Congress.
author: Richard V. Allen

quote: The key to successful missionary work is a close relationship between the missionaries and the members. Creating an environment in working with members that will bring more into the Church.
author: Richard G. Scott

quote: Cinema for me only has meaning when it has a relationship with what I see outside on the street.
author: Jacques Audiard

quote: I wish I had a great relationship with my mother.
author: Chely Wright

quote: When you're watching television, you don't want to watch a show where everything just works out. You don't want to see a relationship that's just blossoming and everyone's happy and sunshine and roses all the time. That's also not true in life.
author: Candice Accola

quote: I think that the two of them have been doing this for a really long time and it is more like sport. Yes, they would love to find a lasting relationship, but it's not likely to happen the way they are going about it.
author: Jennifer Beals

quote: I think it's healthy for couples to be away from each other for short periods.
author: Liv Tyler

quote: I don't think it's necessarily healthy to go into relationships as a needy person. Better to go in with a full deck.
author: Anjelica Huston

quote: People who supported Obama felt like they formed a relationship, that they were being spoken to. The way that campaign worked and the way he's worked during his first term is to make people feel like he's grasping their hand, whether it's by tweeting or email, moments after an event, sometimes during an event. It makes people relate to him.
author: James Spader

quote: Nick and Simon had come to a natural end of their working relationship with Warren, which obviously opened the door for a reunion of the original five.
author: Roger Andrew Taylor

quote: I'm attracted to how fraught the parent-child relationship is, swerving so easily between love and hostility, with almost no plausible way to end, unless someone dies.
author: Ben Marcus

quote: The relationship between me and President Mandela right at the beginning was not a very well-established relationship. It was based on two meetings.
author: F. W. de Klerk

quote: Parents always stay older than you, but sibling sort of become adults together, and that complicates that relationship, I think.
author: Carrie Coon

quote: A lot of people reject the idea of God as Father if they've had a competitive relationship with their own father.
author: Justin Welby

quote: Till now I have never shot a scene without taking account of what stands behind the actors because the relationship between people and their surroundings is of prime importance.
author: Michelangelo Antonioni

quote: There's never been a game plan, and I suppose I've had an uneasy relationship with my ambition. Someone who had been in my year at drama school once said to me that I was terrifyingly ambitious back then. Which was not at all what I felt at the time - I felt paralysed with shyness, though that evaporated.
author: Jennifer Ehle

quote: Writing a book is very personal. It's a very personal relationship. A book will start with something as simple as two men talking about work. That gets the fire going. Sustaining that fire is the hard work. It takes attention and empathy to hone the characters.
author: Ron Carlson

quote: You are not alone with a guy until you are a proper age. You don't go to certain levels with men until you are married or you have a certain relationship.
author: Daisy Fuentes

quote: I really enjoy being single again. I spent a lot of time in a relationship and the nearer we came to the end, the more difficult it got. You don't see things clearly as long as you're still involved.
author: Dido Armstrong

quote: The one who loves the least, controls the relationship.
author: Robert Anthony

quote: You can't stop loving or wanting to love because when its right it's the best thing in the world. When you're in a relationship and its good, even if nothing else in your life is right, you feel like your whole world is complete.
author: Keith Sweat

quote: Nature is a dream state at this point, that we almost don't have a real relationship to it unless it's people living off the land and killing our own food and going for it.
author: Catherine Opie

quote: The Spirit is a kind of postmodern loner hero. He comes from nowhere he has no real relationship to anything.
author: David Newman

quote: But the relationship of morality and power is a very subtle one. Because ultimately power without morality is no longer power.
author: James Baldwin

quote: I'm in a monogamous relationship and very happy.
author: Frances Bean Cobain

quote: My brother and I have too good a relationship to spoil it by working together.
author: Trevor Phillips

quote: My husband and I have, in some ways, a non-traditional relationship - especially when it comes to domestic duties. He does most of the cooking, dishes, and laundry, while I do most of the yard work. I love to mow the lawn! And I take great satisfaction in planting and pruning.
author: Therese Fowler

quote: The relationship between 'My Chemical Romance' and Michael Pedicone is over. He was caught red-handed stealing from the band and confessed to police after our show last night in Auburn, Washington. We are heartbroken and sick to our stomachs over this entire situation.
author: Frank Iero

quote: There's the conforming 9-to-5-lifestyle thing. Then there's, like, settling down, trying to find a balance in a relationship sense, or having a dog and having a house. All these things, like, they're not really gonna make you happy.
author: Ty Segall

quote: A healthy relationship is built on unwavering trust.
author: Beau Mirchoff

quote: I think we actually punish children out of their relationship with their bodies... we categorically separate mind and body and emotion and intellect.
author: Susan Griffin

quote: We saw what happened in Jimmy Carter's administration. President Carter was a good man with the best of intentions. But he came to Washington without a good working relationship with Democratic members of Congress, which played a big part in his administration's problems.
author: Jim Hunt

quote: It is clear that there needs to be a closer working relationship between the United States and India. How can we have a close relationship if decision-makers in Washington know very little, if anything, about the religious beliefs, values, and practices of India's 800 million Hindus?
author: Tulsi Gabbard

quote: I've written a detective series myself, set in an imaginary, and slightly futuristic, Chinese city. The novels have an extremely tenuous relationship with the real world, since the hero is the city's Hell and ends up with a sidekick who is a demon.
author: Liz Williams

quote: If I were to make an uneducated guess about L.A.'s relationship with folk and psychedelia, I would say it must be the weather.
author: Rain Phoenix

quote: Caesar might have married Cleopatra, but he had a wife at home. There's always something.
author: Will Cuppy

quote: I did make some not-so-great relationship decisions when I was a lot younger. I do know that not all high school boys are great and wonderful and Prince Charming, and there are a few that are going to treat you that way.
author: Jodi Lyn O'Keefe

quote: I have a lot of disrespect for people who cheat. I feel like if you're in a position in a relationship where you want to see other people, and the opportunity to cheat comes up, don't.
author: Avan Jogia

quote: It's such a thrilling part about being in a relationship at a young age, and all your feelings are apocalyptic, all your emotions are so huge.
author: Marc Webb

quote: I think there is a longing in everyone for a personal relationship with God.
author: Martha McSally

quote: I don't need a Hollywood girl. They're crazy. If you're with an actress, you don't know who you're going to come home to every day. But I wouldn't mind a relationship with the right girl. Every artist needs a muse.
author: JC Chasez

quote: I've definitely had those moments when I think a relationship with somebody is one way, and then it just flips.
author: Yael Stone

quote: Women won't let me stay single and I won't let me stay married.
author: Errol Flynn

quote: There is no more moving a professional relationship than that between a law clerk and a Supreme Court justice. As a place to work, the court is unique in its intimacy and intensity.
author: Cliff Sloan

quote: Having girlfriends is... I can't do it. It doesn't mean I don't hang out with girls. It just means that I don't like being in a relationship, because it makes things very complicated. The one piece of advice that I listen to adults on - because I don't listen to adults when it comes to most things - is that I'm too young to have a girlfriend.
author: Jaden Smith

quote: There is a curious relationship between a candidate and the reporters who cover him. It can be affected by small things like a competent press staff, enough seats, sandwiches and briefings and the ability to understand deadlines.
author: Ronald Steel

quote: I get excited about what the Holy Spirit is doing now through all the people he is refining and raising up all over this planet. I love connections and relationship and networking but it must be led by the Spirit.
author: Daniel Smith

quote: When my body is covered and disappears, it's not about the relationship between me and the wall, but the relationship between me as an individual and those slogans which are used to fool the public.
author: Liu Bolin

quote: In the best of all possible worlds, February 14 is a pleasant and sentimental opportunity to lavish your partner with attention or move your relationship to the next level.
author: Pepper Schwartz

quote: A grandchild is a miracle, but a renewed relationship with your own children is even a greater one.
author: T. Berry Brazelton

quote: Coming together is a beginning keeping together is progress working together is success.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: The secret of your success is determined by your daily agenda.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
author: Bill Bradley

quote: Success is a journey, not a destination. The doing is often more important than the outcome.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Success is not a destination, but the road that you're on. Being successful means that you're working hard and walking your walk every day. You can only live your dream by working hard towards it. That's living your dream.
author: Marlon Wayans

quote: Honesty and loyalty are key. If two people can be honest with each other about everything, that's probably the biggest key to success.
author: Taylor Lautner

quote: Just remember, you can't climb the ladder of success with your hands in your pockets.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Our goals can only be reached through a vehicle of a plan, in which we must fervently believe, and upon which we must vigorously act. There is no other route to success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Earn your success based on service to others, not at the expense of others.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
author: David Brinkley

quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Success makes so many people hate you. I wish it wasn't that way. It would be wonderful to enjoy success without seeing envy in the eyes of those around you.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Before you are a leader, success is all about growing yourself. When you become a leader, success is all about growing others.
author: Jack Welch

quote: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The successful man will profit from his mistakes and try again in a different way.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: If you wish to be a success in the world, promise everything, deliver nothing.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Success is almost totally dependent upon drive and persistence. The extra energy required to make another effort or try another approach is the secret of winning.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: The key to success is action, and the essential in action is perseverance.
author: Sun Yat-sen

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's the determination and commitment to unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Success is about dedication. You may not be where you want to be or do what you want to do when you're on the journey. But you've got to be willing to have vision and foresight that leads you to an incredible end.
author: Usher

quote: Do something you really like, and hopefully it pays the rent. As far as I'm concerned, that's success.
author: Tom Petty

quote: I'm always asked, 'What's the secret to success?' But there are no secrets. Be humble. Be hungry. And always be the hardest worker in the room.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: Invincibility lies in the defence the possibility of victory in the attack.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: A key to achieving success is to assemble a strong and stable management team.
author: Vivek Wadhwa

quote: Do you wish to rise? Begin by descending. You plan a tower that will pierce the clouds? Lay first the foundation of humility.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: You were designed for accomplishment, engineered for success, and endowed with the seeds of greatness.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Talent alone won't make you a success. Neither will being in the right place at the right time, unless you are ready. The most important question is: 'Are your ready?'
author: Johnny Carson

quote: Challenge is the pathway to engagement and progress in our lives. But not all challenges are created equal. Some challenges make us feel alive, engaged, connected, and fulfilled. Others simply overwhelm us. Knowing the difference as you set bigger and bolder challenges for yourself is critical to your sanity, success, and satisfaction.
author: Brendon Burchard

quote: The secret of our success is that we never, never give up.
author: Wilma Mankiller

quote: Obstacles are necessary for success because in selling, as in all careers of importance, victory comes only after many struggles and countless defeats.
author: Og Mandino

quote: If there is any one secret of success, it lies in the ability to get the other person's point of view and see things from that person's angle as well as from your own.
author: Henry Ford

quote: If you find it in your heart to care for somebody else, you will have succeeded.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Life is a series of punches. It presents a lot of challenges. It presents a lot of hardship, but the people that are able to take those punches and able to move forward are the ones that really do have a lot of success and have a lot of joy in their life and have a lot of stories to tell, too.
author: Josh Turner

quote: If you have no critics you'll likely have no success.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Success is not a function of the size of your title but the richness of your contribution.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: My success isn't a result of arrogance - it's a result of belief.
author: Conor McGregor

quote: The keys to brand success are self-definition, transparency, authenticity and accountability.
author: Simon Mainwaring

quote: My powers are ordinary. Only my application brings me success.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: As my father used to tell me, the only true sign of success in life is being able to do for a living that which makes you happy.
author: Al Yankovic

quote: No one succeeds without effort... Those who succeed owe their success to perseverance.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: Always remember that striving and struggle precede success, even in the dictionary.
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: Enjoying success requires the ability to adapt. Only by being open to change will you have a true opportunity to get the most from your talent.
author: Nolan Ryan

quote: Success in life is founded upon attention to the small things rather than to the large things to the every day things nearest to us rather than to the things that are remote and uncommon.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: A champion is afraid of losing. Everyone else is afraid of winning.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Ambition is the path to success, persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
author: William Eardley IV

quote: A rejection is nothing more than a necessary step in the pursuit of success.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: Winning isn't everything, it's the only thing.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: I have an idea of who I want to be, I have a vision of my own success.
author: Wiz Khalifa

quote: No student ever attains very eminent success by simply doing what is required of him: it is the amount and excellence of what is over and above the required, that determines the greatness of ultimate distinction.
author: Charles Kendall Adams

quote: There is nothing more difficult to take in hand, more perilous to conduct, or more uncertain in its success, than to take the lead in the introduction of a new order of things.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: Anybody who succeeds is helping people. The secret to success is find a need and fill it find a hurt and heal it find a problem and solve it.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: For me, success is a state of mind. I feel like success isn't about conquering something; it's being happy with who you are.
author: Britney Spears

quote: The most important thing is being passionate about what you're doing and always give it your all. That is the key to success.
author: Charlie White

quote: Victory has a thousand fathers, but defeat is an orphan.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: There's no success story. Everybody's got a ghetto story. You always want to make it bigger than what it is.
author: Bernie Mac

quote: The most important single ingredient in the formula of success is knowing how to get along with people.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Success is achieved by developing our strengths, not by eliminating our weaknesses.
author: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: There are people who can achieve huge success in life, while adding a bit of fun and a splash of colour to this increasingly grey world.
author: Peter James

quote: Success is all about persistence and doing the right thing for the long term.
author: Bruce Rauner

quote: I'm an addict, I'm addicted to success. Thankfully, there's no rehab for success.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: I look at where I'm at today and realize that most of my success is owed to the mentors that was in my life.
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote: I was obliged to be industrious. Whoever is equally industrious will succeed equally well.
author: Johann Sebastian Bach

quote: The cost of our success is the exhaustion of natural resources, leading to energy crises, climate change, pollution, and the destruction of our habitat. If you exhaust natural resources, there will be nothing left for your children. If we continue in the same direction, humankind is headed for some frightful ordeals, if not extinction.
author: Christian de Duve

quote: To be prepared is half the victory.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Success to me is being a good person, treating people well.
author: David LaChapelle

quote: Every soldier must know, before he goes into battle, how the little battle he is to fight fits into the larger picture, and how the success of his fighting will influence the battle as a whole.
author: Bernard Law Montgomery

quote: Fortune befriends the bold.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Success is only meaningful and enjoyable if it feels like your own.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Success is neither magical nor mysterious. Success is the natural consequence of consistently applying the basic fundamentals.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal or ideal.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: There is no success without hardship.
author: Sophocles

quote: Sustainability is the key to our survival on this planet and will also determine success on all levels.
author: Shari Arison

quote: Of all the things people have taught me regarding life lessons or anything that would benefit me, I don't think anything helped me learn more about life than football. You go through so many different things: adversity, how to handle adversity, how to handle success, how to lead, how to be a teammate, how to communicate.
author: Josh McDaniels

quote: I think true success is intrinsic... It's love. It's kindness. It's community.
author: Tom Shadyac

quote: You might well remember that nothing can bring you success but yourself.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Whatever obstacle comes your way, you gotta be prepared to jump over it! And I think that's what separates the legends from the regular artists. It's all in how you manage that success, and how you deal with the controversy when it actually comes.
author: Akon

quote: Discipline is the soul of an army. It makes small numbers formidable; procures success to the weak, and esteem to all.
author: George Washington

quote: Before everything else, getting ready is the secret of success.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts - repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: Success is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: There's no abiding success without commitment.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: I am fully aware that everybody has a right to succeed, and success should be with ethics.
author: Sharad Pawar

quote: Focus on being balanced - success is balance.
author: Laila Ali

quote: We should measure welfare's success by how many people leave welfare, not by how many are added.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Our purpose in Vietnam is to prevent the success of aggression. It is not conquest, it is not empire, it is not foreign bases, it is not domination. It is, simply put, just to prevent the forceful conquest of South Vietnam by North Vietnam.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Then quit. There's no point in being a damn fool about it.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: The one thing that I know is that you win with good people.
author: Don Shula

quote: I think baking is very rewarding, and if you follow a good recipe, you will get success.
author: Mary Berry

quote: I think that success is having fun.
author: Bruno Mars

quote: Success is nothing if you don't have the right people to share it with you're just gonna end up lonely.
author: Selena Gomez

quote: Steroids do not guarantee you're going to have success. I think a lot of people think that they will, but they don't.
author: Tony Gwynn

quote: Success without honor is an unseasoned dish; it will satisfy your hunger, but it won't taste good.
author: Joe Paterno

quote: Those who cannot work with their hearts achieve but a hollow, half-hearted success that breeds bitterness all around.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: You stand with the least likely to succeed until success is succeeded by something more valuable: kinship. You stand with the belligerent, the surly and the badly behaved until bad behavior is recognized for the language it is: the vocabulary of the deeply wounded and of those whose burdens are more than they can bear.
author: Greg Boyle

quote: Success is not a matter of mastering subtle, sophisticated theory but rather of embracing common sense with uncommon levels of discipline and persistence.
author: Patrick Lencioni

quote: You don't have to be a genius or a visionary or even a college graduate to be successful. You just need a framework and a dream.
author: Michael Dell

quote: The negative side of the American Dream comes when people pursue success at any cost, which in turn destroys the vision and the dream.
author: Azar Nafisi

quote: The secrets of success are a good wife and a steady job. My wife told me.
author: Howard Nemerov

quote: No matter how much success you're having, you can't continue working together if you can't communicate.
author: Matt Cameron

quote: The very first step towards success in any occupation is to become interested in it.
author: William Osler

quote: You wanna know what scares people? Success. When you don't make moves and when you don't climb up the ladder, everybody loves you because you're not competition.
author: Nicki Minaj

quote: Winning isn't everything, but it beats anything in second place.
author: William C. Bryant

quote: A manager is a guide. He takes a group of people and says, 'With you I can make us a success; I can show you the way.'
author: Arsene Wenger

quote: That man is a success who has lived well, laughed often and loved much.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Whether you come from a council estate or a country estate, your success will be determined by your own confidence and fortitude.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: The most glorious moments in your life are not the so-called days of success, but rather those days when out of dejection and despair you feel rise in you a challenge to life, and the promise of future accomplishments.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: It's both rebellion and conformity that attack you with success.
author: Amy Tan

quote: My store, Wine Library, outsells big national chains. How do you think we do it? It started with hustle. I always say that our success wasn't due to my hundreds of online videos about wine that went viral, but to the hours I spent talking to people online afterward, making connections and building relationships.
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: Success isn't about the end result, it's about what you learn along the way.
author: Vera Wang

quote: The success of the Rat Pack or the Clan was due to the camaraderie, the three guys who work together and kid each other and love each other.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: Success produces confidence; confidence relaxes industry, and negligence ruins the reputation which accuracy had raised.
author: Ben Jonson

quote: There are people who make things happen, there are people who watch things happen, and there are people who wonder what happened. To be successful, you need to be a person who makes things happen.
author: Jim Lovell

quote: The ladder of success is never crowded at the top.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: While formal schooling is an important advantage, it is not a guarantee of success nor is its absence a fatal handicap.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: Obedience is the mother of success and is wedded to safety.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Every skill you acquire doubles your odds of success.
author: Scott Adams

quote: A desire to be in charge of our own lives, a need for control, is born in each of us. It is essential to our mental health, and our success, that we take control.
author: Robert Foster Bennett

quote: A friend of mine said something powerful at his grandfather's funeral. He said that the greatest lesson from his grandfather's life was that he died empty, because he accomplished everything he wanted, with no regrets. I think that, along with leaving a legacy, would be the greatest sign of success.
author: Marvin Sapp

quote: Success is blocked by concentrating on it and planning for it... Success is shy - it won't come out while you're watching.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: I have had all of the disadvantages required for success.
author: Larry Ellison

quote: You've got to eat while you dream. You've got to deliver on short-range commitments, while you develop a long-range strategy and vision and implement it. The success of doing both. Walking and chewing gum if you will. Getting it done in the short-range, and delivering a long-range plan, and executing on that.
author: Jack Welch

quote: Once you have a lot of success, you become a target in many ways.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: Flaming enthusiasm, backed up by horse sense and persistence, is the quality that most frequently makes for success.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Success has a simple formula: do your best, and people may like it.
author: Sam Ewing

quote: Do you remember any instance where tyranny was destroyed and freedom established on its ruins, among a people possessing so small a share of virtue and public spirit? I recollect none, and this more than the British arms makes me fearful of final success, without a reform.
author: Patrick Henry

quote: Nothing succeeds like success. Get a little success, and then just get a little more.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The only thing I'm addicted to is winning. This bootleg cult, arrogantly referred to as Alcoholics Anonymous, reports a 5 percent success rate. My success rate is 100 percent.
author: Charlie Sheen

quote: All those who are around me are the bridge to my success, so they are all important.
author: Manny Pacquiao

quote: Being kind is the most important thing I've ever been taught. That's what my parents always told me - more important than ambition or success is being kind to people. The cornerstone of my life. What I aspire to is to be kind.
author: Rafe Spall

quote: The road to success runs uphill.
author: Willie Davis

quote: Your success depends mainly upon what you think of yourself and whether you believe in yourself.
author: William J. H. Boetcker

quote: The most successful men in the end are those whose success is the result of steady accretion.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: It is the combination of reasonable talent and the ability to keep going in the face of defeat that leads to success.
author: Martin Seligman

quote: You weren't born just to live a life and to die; you were born to accomplish something specifically. Matter of fact, success is making it to the end of your purpose; that is success... Success is not just existing. Success is making it to the end of why you were born.
author: Myles Munroe

quote: After I won the Oscar, my salary doubled, my friends tripled, my children became more popular at school, my butcher made a pass at me, and my maid hit me up for a raise.
author: Shirley Jones

quote: You may lose your wife, you may lose your dog, your mother may hate you. None of those things matter. What matters is that you achieve success and become free. Then you can do whatever you like.
author: Kevin O'Leary

quote: You grow up a bit damaged or broken then you have some success but you don't know how to feel good about the work you're doing or the life you're leading.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: Every success story has a parent who says, 'over my dead body.' Every success story has an old person who walks up to you and says, when you're acting the fool, 'you know I worry about you sometimes.'
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Success is dependent on effort.
author: Sophocles

quote: Success seems to be largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go.
author: William Feather

quote: It is not the going out of port, but the coming in, that determines the success of a voyage.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: One measure of your success will be the degree to which you build up others who work with you. While building up others, you will build up yourself.
author: James E. Casey

quote: A person with a new idea is a crank until the idea succeeds.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The secret of success is sincerity.
author: Jean Giraudoux

quote: In order to attain the impossible, one must attempt the absurd.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Success is falling nine times and getting up ten.
author: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: I get invited to many more literary festivals than I used to because I'm associated with 'Slumdog Millionaire,' the brand. Many more doors have opened up for me as a result of the global success of the film, although I believe that I'm the same person that existed before it.
author: Vikas Swarup

quote: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: When you see something that is technically sweet, you go ahead and do it and you argue about what to do about it only after you have had your technical success. That is the way it was with the atomic bomb.
author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quote: By providing clear objectives for your team, and setting guardrails for how they get there, you will set them on the path to success.
author: Chris Fussell

quote: I can honestly say that I was never affected by the question of the success of an undertaking. If I felt it was the right thing to do, I was for it regardless of the possible outcome.
author: Golda Meir

quote: Each success only buys an admission ticket to a more difficult problem.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: Success is the sum of details.
author: Harvey S. Firestone

quote: We are taught to consume. And that's what we do. But if we realized that there really is no reason to consume, that it's just a mind set, that it's just an addiction, then we wouldn't be out there stepping on people's hands climbing the corporate ladder of success.
author: River Phoenix

quote: One fails forward toward success.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: The secret of success is to be in harmony with existence, to be always calm to let each wave of life wash us a little farther up the shore.
author: Cyril Connolly

quote: Success is the child of drudgery and perseverance. It cannot be coaxed or bribed pay the price and it is yours.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: It's the steady, quiet, plodding ones who win in the lifelong race.
author: Robert W. Service

quote: The success of a production depends on the attention paid to detail.
author: David O. Selznick

quote: Personal relationships are the fertile soil from which all advancement, all success, all achievement in real life grows.
author: Ben Stein

quote: Success is the maximum utilization of the ability that you have.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The first principle of success is desire - knowing what you want. Desire is the planting of your seed.
author: Robert Collier

quote: I don't think 'Cocktail' was a perfect critical success, but it touched a vein in our culture.
author: Elisabeth Shue

quote: I always say be humble but be firm. Humility and openness are the key to success without compromising your beliefs.
author: George Hickenlooper

quote: Anyone who has to fight, even with the most modern weapons, against an enemy in complete command of the air, fights like a savage against modern European troops, under the same handicaps and with the same chances of success.
author: Erwin Rommel

quote: The only true measure of success is the ratio between what we might have done and what we might have been on the one hand, and the thing we have made and the things we have made of ourselves on the other.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: The real success in golf lies in turning three shots into two.
author: Bobby Locke

quote: In the end, you make your reputation and you have your success based upon credibility and being able to provide people who are really hungry for information what they want.
author: Brit Hume

quote: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success.
author: George Herman

quote: Success is what you do with your ability. It's how you use your talent.
author: George Allen, Sr.

quote: To be ready to fail is to be prepared for success.
author: Jose Bergamin

quote: We can come to look upon the deaths of our enemies with as much regret as we feel for those of our friends, namely, when we miss their existence as witnesses to our success.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Success comes in waves.
author: Guy Pearce

quote: Success for me means being able to work. I don't look at so much at what I've done as much as I look to what I will do.
author: Phylicia Rashad

quote: The one phrase you can use is that success has a thousand fathers, and failure is an orphan.
author: Alan Price

quote: Success is steady progress toward one's personal goals.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: It's a special person - and personality - who can lead a start-up to soaring success and sustain that success for the long term. Apple co-founder Steve Jobs and Facebook's Mark Zuckerberg are star examples.
author: Marcus Buckingham

quote: An artist must never be a prisoner. Prisoner? An artist should never be a prisoner of himself, prisoner of style, prisoner of reputation, prisoner of success, etc.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: The superior man makes the difficulty to be overcome his first interest success only comes later.
author: Confucius

quote: Success cannot come from standstill men. Methods change and men must change with them.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: You really have to work hard and apply yourself and by applying yourself and working hard and being diligent, you can achieve success.
author: Julie Benz

quote: Success - it's what you do with what you've got.
author: Woody Hayes

quote: I wonder how many times people give up just before a breakthrough - when they are on the very brink of success.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: You never achieve success unless you like what you are doing.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: What drives success, and the most successful students, is internal motivation.
author: Vivienne Ming

quote: Success is counted sweetest by those who never succeed.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Success - keeping your mind awake and your desire asleep.
author: Walter Scott

quote: The real secret of success is enthusiasm.
author: Walter Chrysler

quote: Success is a terrible thing and a wonderful thing. If you can enjoy it, it's wonderful. If it starts eating away at you, and they're waiting for more from me, or what can I do to top this, then you're in trouble. Just do what you love. That's all I want to do.
author: Gene Wilder

quote: When one side benefits more than the other, that's a win-lose situation. To the winner it might look like success for a while, but in the long run, it breeds resentment and distrust.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Our limitations and success will be based, most often, on your own expectations for ourselves. What the mind dwells upon, the body acts upon.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: People think your success is just a matter of having a pretty face. But it's easy to be chewed up and spat out. You've got to stay ahead of the game to be able to stay in it.
author: Kate Moss

quote: Success is little more than a chemical compound of man with moment.
author: Philip Guedalla

quote: There is no force like success, and that is why the individual makes all effort to surround himself throughout life with the evidence of it; as of the individual, so should it be of the nation.
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: You cannot allow your desire to be a winner to be diminished by achieving success before and I believe there is room for improvement in every sportsman.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: Success depends almost entirely on how effectively you learn to manage the game's two ultimate adversaries: the course and yourself.
author: Jack Nicklaus

quote: Success is often the result of taking a misstep in the right direction.
author: Al Bernstein

quote: Success is sweet and sweeter if long delayed and gotten through many struggles and defeats.
author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I have learned that success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has had to overcome while trying to succeed.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: There is only one success - to be able to spend your life in your own way.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: Much effort, much prosperity.
author: Euripides

quote: There is no substitute for victory.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: Most people give up just when they're about to achieve success. They quit on the one yard line. They give up at the last minute of the game one foot from a winning touchdown.
author: Ross Perot

quote: Belief in oneself is one of the most important bricks in building any successful venture.
author: Lydia M. Child

quote: People think that at the top there isn't much room. They tend to think of it as an Everest. My message is that there is tons of room at the top.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Success consists of getting up just one more time than you fall.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: They succeed, because they think they can.
author: Virgil

quote: Success is finding satisfaction in giving a little more than you take.
author: Christopher Reeve

quote: The secret of my success is a two word answer: Know people.
author: Harvey S. Firestone

quote: Success breeds success.
author: Mia Hamm

quote: God lets you be successful because he trusts you that you will do the right thing with it. Now, does he get disappointed often? All the time, because people get there and they forget how they got it.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: Actually, I'm an overnight success, but it took twenty years.
author: Monty Hall

quote: When you're working hard and doing all you can to achieve your goals, anything that can give you an edge is powerful and will streamline your path to success.
author: Travis Bradberry

quote: After a lifetime of working, raising families, and contributing to the success of this nation in countless other ways, senior citizens deserve to retire with dignity.
author: Charlie Gonzalez

quote: Anything that won't sell, I don't want to invent. Its sale is proof of utility, and utility is success.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: For true success ask yourself these four questions: Why? Why not? Why not me? Why not now?
author: James Allen

quote: Success is not only one thing. It's not only having a nice house in Beverly Hills and driving a nice Mercedes.
author: Malik Bendjelloul

quote: Time is the most precious element of human existence. The successful person knows how to put energy into time and how to draw success from time.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Carry on any enterprise as if all future success depended on it.
author: Cardinal Richelieu

quote: If a man has been his mother's undisputed darling he retains throughout life the triumphant feeling, the confidence in success, which not seldom brings actual success along with it.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: There's more to life than success, and if you can try to be more well-rounded, you'll be able to enjoy your success more. It won't own you or control you.
author: Ricky Williams

quote: Real success is being totally indulgent about your own trip. You put your blinders on about the garbage and go full speed ahead.
author: Betsey Johnson

quote: I never expected any sort of success with 'Mockingbird'... I sort of hoped someone would like it enough to give me encouragement.
author: Harper Lee

quote: To have success in your professional life is not so hard. To succeed as a man is more difficult.
author: Yann Arthus-Bertrand

quote: The hardest thing to find in life is balance - especially, the more success you have, the more you look to the other side of the gate.
author: Celine Dion

quote: Some say I'm an overnight success. Well, that was a very long night that lasted about 10 years.
author: Lisa Morton

quote: We know from research that growth is actually contagious, so if you want to reach your goals, you've got to get around people that are going in the same direction you want to be going, and you will catch the success.
author: Henry Cloud

quote: The difference between us and them, between you and success, is not that you never fail, but it's how you recover from those failures - is that you keep getting up time and time again. You figure out what you did wrong, and then you make it right. I say that to my kids every day.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Success is the child of audacity.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Success requires first expending ten units of effort to produce one unit of results. Your momentum will then produce ten units of results with each unit of effort.
author: Charles J. Givens

quote: Success consists in being successful, not in having potential for success. Any wide piece of ground is the potential site of a palace, but there's no palace till it's built.
author: Fernando Pessoa

quote: A long apprenticeship is the most logical way to success. The only alternative is overnight stardom, but I can't give you a formula for that.
author: Chet Atkins

quote: The success of any great moral enterprise does not depend upon numbers.
author: William Lloyd Garrison

quote: When I meet with the founders of a new company, my advice is almost always, 'Do fewer things.' It's true of partnerships, marketing opportunities, anything that's taking up your time. The vast majority of things are distractions, and very few really matter to your success.
author: Evan Williams

quote: Fame or perceived success - it all comes from groupthink.
author: Chance The Rapper

quote: The success of the young entrepreneur will be the key to India's transformation in the new millennium.
author: Dhirubhai Ambani

quote: I tried out various experiments described in treatises on physics and chemistry, and the results were sometimes unexpected. At times, I would be encouraged by a little unhoped-for success; at others, I would be in the deepest despair because of accidents and failures resulting from my inexperience.
author: Marie Curie

quote: Only stupid people are changed by success.
author: Jurgen Klopp

quote: We don't have a divine right to success. So I agree with a lot of politicians out there when they say, 'We've got serious issues.' We do: immigration, infrastructure. I think income inequality's one of them.
author: Jamie Dimon

quote: You know you've reached true success the day you become truly humble. That's the day you stop needing to prove to the world - and yourself - that you've accomplished something meaningful.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: Success? You can't get a big head about it. When people stare at me, they could be whispering to their friend, 'That guy sucks! Have you seen him before? He's horrible.'
author: David Spade

quote: In most things success depends on knowing how long it takes to succeed.
author: Charles de Montesquieu

quote: Real success is finding you lifework in the work that you love.
author: David McCullough

quote: The most absurd and reckless aspirations have sometimes led to extraordinary success.
author: Luc de Clapiers

quote: Applause waits on success.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Success has always been easy to measure. It is the distance between one's origins and one's final achievement.
author: Michael Korda

quote: Success is full of promise till one gets it, and then it seems like a nest from which the bird has flown.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: The more defects a man may have, the older he is, the less lovable, the more resounding his success.
author: Marquis de Sade

quote: Success is about enjoying what you have and where you are, while pursuing achievable goals.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: I have found no greater satisfaction than achieving success through honest dealing and strict adherence to the view that, for you to gain, those you deal with should gain as well.
author: Alan Greenspan

quote: The first and most important step toward success is the feeling that we can succeed.
author: Nelson Boswell

quote: We just want to win. That's the bottom line. I think a lot of times people may become content with one championship or a little bit of success, but we don't really reflect on what we've done in the past. We focus on the present.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: I don't know what keeps me going. Sometimes I wonder... I think it's just pure perseverance and wanting to succeed and having that burning desire to always have success.
author: Tanya Tucker

quote: Academic success depends on research and publications.
author: Philip Zimbardo

quote: How does one measure the success of a museum?
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: To burn always with this hard, gem-like flame, to maintain this ecstasy, is success in life.
author: Walter Pater

quote: It takes 20 years to make an overnight success.
author: Eddie Cantor

quote: The development of our human resources is an area in which we need to do well as it is decisive in determining the success of our diversification programme.
author: Hassanal Bolkiah

quote: I congratulate you, my brave countrymen and fellow soldiers, on the spirit and success with which you have executed this important part of our enterprise.
author: James Wolfe

quote: Our success educationally, industrially and politically is based upon the protection of a nation founded by ourselves. And the nation can be nowhere else but in Africa.
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: Success is dependent upon the glands - sweat glands.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Raising children is an uncertain thing success is reached only after a life of battle and worry.
author: Democritus

quote: Never mind what others do; do better than yourself, beat your own record from day to day, and you are a success.
author: William J. H. Boetcker

quote: Success depends in a very large measure upon individual initiative and exertion, and cannot be achieved except by a dint of hard work.
author: Anna Pavlova

quote: We're constantly striving for success, fame and comfort when all we really need to be happy is someone or some thing to be enthusiastic about.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: One man cannot practice many arts with success.
author: Plato

quote: I remember one day sitting at the pool and suddenly the tears were streaming down my cheeks. Why was I so unhappy? I had success. I had security. But it wasn't enough. I was exploding inside.
author: Ingrid Bergman

quote: Success is dangerous. One begins to copy oneself, and to copy oneself is more dangerous than to copy others. It leads to sterility.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: What I have in common with the character in 'Truman' is this incredible need to please people. I feel like I want to take care of everyone and I also feel this terrible guilt if I am unable to. And I have felt this way ever since all this success started.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: You look at the tremendous success of Facebook. To my mind there is not a lot of commerce going on in these social networking sites. eBay is a community anchored in commerce. It is a commerce site that built a community around it. What has not been proven is if the reverse can happen and people will go to community sites to do commerce.
author: Meg Whitman

quote: We are constantly emphasizing to people that they need to address anything that affects flight safety or mission success - many pathways to do that. We need to understand better what may be preventing people from using those pathways.
author: Ellen Ochoa

quote: When people stand up and talk about the great success that the EU has been, I'm not sure anybody saying it really believes it themselves anymore.
author: Nigel Farage

quote: In hindsight, I slid into arrogance based upon past success.
author: Reed Hastings

quote: In inner-city, low-income communities of color, there's such a high correlation in terms of educational quality and success.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Success is the American Dream. And that success is not something to be ashamed of, or to demonize.
author: Susana Martinez

quote: I think it's way harder when you have success, 'cause people tend to not treat you the same or look at you the same because they see the success or the money you make.
author: Meek Mill

quote: Lord knows, every day is not a success, every year is not a success. You have to celebrate the good.
author: Reese Witherspoon

quote: No skill shapes a child's future success in school or in life more than the ability to read.
author: Bob Riley

quote: I sort of understood that when I first started: that you shouldn't repeat a success. Very often you're going to, and maybe the first time you do, it works. And you love it. But then you're trapped.
author: Jack Nicholson

quote: People are beginning to see that the first requisite to success in life is to be a good animal.
author: Herbert Spencer

quote: Within the hearts men, loyalty and consideration are esteemed greater than success.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: In the United States, I am a great success, but I am not a celebrity.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: When you win, nothing hurts.
author: Joe Namath

quote: To do a common thing uncommonly well brings success.
author: Henry J. Heinz

quote: What is success? It is a toy balloon among children armed with pins.
author: Gene Fowler

quote: Everything you need for better future and success has already been written. And guess what? All you have to do is go to the library.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Don't confuse fame with success. Madonna is one Helen Keller is the other.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Success has nothing to do with what you gain in life or accomplish for yourself. It's what you do for others.
author: Danny Thomas

quote: Real success is not, like, materialistic. It's being where you want to be when you want to be; just living your life how you feel; having an ultimate goal and being able to accomplish it.
author: Lindsey Wixson

quote: I find my greatest pleasure, and so my reward, in the work that precedes what the world calls success.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: I came to America with a dream and I made it. The dream became reality. America is built for success.
author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

quote: I want to see success right away. And I want to never give up, never stop.
author: Joe Nichols

quote: I suppose your security is your success and your key to success is your fine palate.
author: Gordon Ramsay

quote: Success in training the boy depends largely on the Scoutmaster's own personal example.
author: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: Success is a process, a quality of mind and way of being, an outgoing affirmation of life.
author: Alex Noble

quote: In actuality, California could be a wonderful place to live. In fact, if you're highly educated and ambitious, you can do quite well here while enjoying the sun and the fun. The only problem: California will then blame you for your success and recommend that all your cash be removed from you.
author: Ben Shapiro

quote: My parents are very proud of my success but still worry, as I'm in a profession where there is no guarantee of work. They have always supported my decision to go into acting, but there have been tough times work-wise.
author: David Harewood

quote: Remember you will not always win. Some days, the most resourceful individual will taste defeat. But there is, in this case, always tomorrow - after you have done your best to achieve success today.
author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: Feeling anxious or depressed sometimes is part of what it means to be a person, and it might even be essential to success.
author: K. Flay

quote: We've stayed really normal and down to Earth I think, and haven't let the success thing go to our head.
author: Ashley Olsen

quote: A critical factor in its success was that the X developers were willing to give the sources away for free in accordance with the hacker ethic, and able to distribute them over the Internet.
author: Eric S. Raymond

quote: Success is tricky to deal with, both professionally and in your personal life.
author: Ewan McGregor

quote: People are the key to success or extraordinary success.
author: Azim Premji

quote: Success demands singleness of purpose.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: If I had permitted my failures, or what seemed to me at the time a lack of success, to discourage me I cannot see any way in which I would ever have made progress.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: He has achieved success who has worked well, laughed often, and loved much.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: I never assumed I would have that commercial success, so it was a total surprise. And honestly, I never assumed that it would ever happen again.
author: Tracy Chapman

quote: I don't dwell on success. Maybe that's one reason I'm successful.
author: Calvin Klein

quote: Our success as a global brand has been directly related to how we select locations where we are confident our particular clients desire to be. Los Cabos, Mexico is the ideal Engel & Volkers market, growing in popularity among world luxury travelers seeking exceptional properties for second home opportunities.
author: Anthony Hitt

quote: Past success is no guarantee of future success, so I have learned to be an entrepreneur. I began to produce and direct my own projects.
author: Ian Ziering

quote: Teachers are always trying to inspire people to do better, to learn, to grow. That's what we do, and we're proud of the success we've had here doing that, and it's something we'll certainly continue to do.
author: Nick Saban

quote: Be yourself. Follow your instincts. Success depends, at least in part, on the ability to 'carry it off.'
author: Donald Rumsfeld

quote: My definition of success is to live your life in a way that causes you to feel a ton of pleasure and very little pain - and because of your lifestyle, have the people around you feel a lot more pleasure than they do pain.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: When it comes to success, there are no shortcuts.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: Fourth Law of Thermodynamics: If the probability of success is not almost one, then it is damn near zero.
author: David R. Ellis

quote: My definition of success is control.
author: Kenneth Branagh

quote: Success is the progressive realization of predetermined, worthwhile, personal goals.
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: People seldom see the halting and painful steps by which the most insignificant success is achieved.
author: Anne Sullivan

quote: You do not pay the price of success, you enjoy the price of success.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: There is no scientific answer for success. You can't define it. You've simply got to live it and do it.
author: Anita Roddick

quote: The victor belongs to the spoils.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Those who have succeeded at anything and don't mention luck are kidding themselves.
author: Larry King

quote: For an actress to be a success, she must have the face of a Venus, the brains of a Minerva, the grace of Terpsichore, the memory of a MaCaulay, the figure of Juno, and the hide of a rhinoceros.
author: Ethel Barrymore

quote: Honesty is the cornerstone of all success, without which confidence and ability to perform shall cease to exist.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: One of the rewards of success is freedom, the ability to do whatever you like.
author: Sting

quote: We reached a high point in my opinion with the passage of the civil rights legislation and Martin Luther King's success and the crusade of others. I think we kind of breathed a sigh of relief as if we had achieved the end of racial discrimination or white supremacy.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: Perseverance - a lowly virtue whereby mediocrity achieves an inglorious success.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: The successful man doesn't use others, other people use the successful man, for above all the success is of service.
author: Mark Caine

quote: Wal-Mart's success strategies and tactics are easy to understand yet hard to duplicate.
author: Michael Bergdahl

quote: Success is the most important to many, to me it's just a bonus.
author: Lucas Grabeel

quote: There's no one particular road that will lead you to success. I think everybody will find it differently.
author: Marina and the Diamonds

quote: Stem cell research holds enormous promise for easing human suffering, and federal support is critical to its success.
author: Tom Harkin

quote: With the success of a show, you get an opportunity to call attention to things that you believe in.
author: Bradley Whitford

quote: In the United States there's a Puritan ethic and a mythology of success. He who is successful is good. In Latin countries, in Catholic countries, a successful person is a sinner.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: The real end winner of NAFTA is going to be Mexico because we have the human capital. We have that resource that is vital to the success of the U.S. economy.
author: Vicente Fox

quote: Obedience brings success exact obedience brings miracles.
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: To be successful you have to be lucky, or a little mad, or very talented, or find yourself in a rapid growth field.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: Real success is not on the stage, but off the stage as a human being, and how you get along with your fellow man.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: Success follows those adept at preserving the substance of the past by clothing it in the forms of the future.
author: Dee Hock

quote: The hardest thing to find in life is balance - especially the more success you have, the more you look to the other side of the gate. What do I need to stay grounded, in touch, in love, connected, emotionally balanced? Look within yourself.
author: Celine Dion

quote: My goal in coming to General Motors was to help restore profitability, build a strong market position and position this iconic company for success. We are clearly on that path.
author: Edward Whitacre, Jr.

quote: Nothing recedes like success.
author: Walter Winchell

quote: Success can make you go one of two ways. It can make you a prima donna - or it can smooth the edges, take away the insecurities, let the nice things come out.
author: Barbara Walters

quote: Every person who wins in any undertaking must be willing to cut all sources of retreat. Only by doing so can one be sure of maintaining that state of mind known as a burning desire to win - essential to success.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Therefore, if one were to consider that there was virtually no possibility of success through the US-Japan negotiations, the military and economic pressures would only force Japan into further crisis if time were allowed to pass in vain.
author: Hideki Tojo

quote: People of mediocre ability sometimes achieve outstanding success because they don't know when to quit. Most men succeed because they are determined to.
author: George Allen, Sr.

quote: Post-operatively the transplanted kidney functioned immediately with a dramatic improvement in the patient's renal and cardiopulmonary status. This spectacular success was a clear demonstration that organ transplantation could be life-saving.
author: Joseph Murray

quote: There is just a lot of creativity and theatricality in performers who happen to be gay. Maybe there's a success in numbers, so by the law of averages we are going to get these jobs.
author: Neil Patrick Harris

quote: The future of America is not an entitlement. We have been given a treasure chest of gifts and opportunities, but some people are being left behind, and success is not sustainable unless it is shared.
author: Howard Schultz

quote: Things that look like an 'overnight success' typically are not.
author: Jason Calacanis

quote: Even successful musicians have had periods where people say they suck and no one likes them, even after they've had periods of great success. So I think it's like you just gotta do you and try to stay motivated. Until, you know, you decide to stay home and make spaghetti all day.
author: K. Flay

quote: The talent of success is nothing more than doing what you can do well, and doing well whatever you do without thought of fame. If it comes at all it will come because it is deserved, not because it is sought after.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Personal satisfaction is the most important ingredient of success.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Forward, as occasion offers. Never look round to see whether any shall note it... Be satisfied with success in even the smallest matter, and think that even such a result is no trifle.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: There's no secret about success. Did you ever know a successful man who didn't tell you about it?
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: Success is not greedy, as people think, but insignificant. That is why it satisfies nobody.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: You know you are on the road to success if you would do your job, and not be paid for it.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: If I could offer but one helpful hint to young Hoosiers hoping to better their odds for success in life, I would simply note the importance of thoughtful reading.
author: Richard Lugar

quote: Successful people breed success.
author: Phil Crosby

quote: The essential element of successful strategy is that it derives its success from the differences between competitors with a consequent difference in their behavior.
author: Bruce Henderson

quote: We help people to begin truly healthful diets, and it is absolutely wonderful to see, not only their success, but also their delight at their ability to break old habits and feel really healthy for a change.
author: Neal Barnard

quote: Success is just being happy. And I try so many different things. I do a lot of different things. Because I think God has helped me to love myself. I know who God is, and I love God.
author: Herschel Walker

quote: Success listens only to applause. To all else it is deaf.
author: Elias Canetti

quote: Honesty is the most single most important factor having a direct bearing on the final success of an individual, corporation, or product.
author: Ed McMahon

quote: I would like to wish the England squad every success. I would also very much like to extend those wishes to Martin Johnson, Brian Smith, Mike Ford, John Wells, Graham Rowntree and the rest of the England 2011 World Cup management team who have been fantastic and deserve people to know that.
author: Jonny Wilkinson

quote: I know that when I like music, when it touches my heart, that it will touch your heart, too. That, I think, is the secret to my success.
author: Andre Rieu

quote: If you create incredible value and information for others that can change their lives - and you always stay focused on that service - the financial success will follow.
author: Brendon Burchard

quote: I must admit that I personally measure success in terms of the contributions an individual makes to her or his fellow human beings.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: The only yardstick for success our society has is being a champion. No one remembers anything else.
author: John Madden

quote: I define success as being comfortable with yourself and your life. And that is about as good as it gets, really.
author: Treat Williams

quote: I think you can have moderate success by copying something else, but if you really want to knock it out of the park, you have to do something different and take chances.
author: Lee Ann Womack

quote: I am stable when my private life is a success.
author: Don Johnson
category: Life, I Am, Life Is A

quote: Possessed with a full confidence of the certain success which British valor must gain over such enemies, I have led you up these steep and dangerous rocks, only solicitous to show you the foe within your reach.
author: James Wolfe

quote: Success is a great deodorant.
author: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: Nothing is as seductive as the assurance of success.
author: Gertrude Himmelfarb

quote: I think the biggest challenge is to continue on the same path. I think it's easy to become complacent from the success you've had.
author: Jason Derulo

quote: Other people's success spurs me on to do well and gives me motivation.
author: Nicholas Hoult

quote: In order to succeed you must fail, so that you know what not to do the next time.
author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: Pray that success will not come any faster than you are able to endure it.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The toughest thing about success is that you've got to keep on being a success.
author: Irving Berlin

quote: The measure of success is not whether you have a tough problem to deal with, but whether it is the same problem you had last year.
author: John Foster Dulles

quote: Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: One needs more than ambition and talent to make a success of anything, really. There must be love and a vocation.
author: Jessye Norman

quote: I've had great success being a total idiot.
author: Jerry Lewis

quote: In order that people may be happy in their work, these three things are needed: They must be fit for it. They must not do too much of it. And they must have a sense of success in it.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Why be a man when you can be a success?
author: Bertolt Brecht

quote: Success is the sweetest revenge.
author: Vanessa Williams

quote: Despite the success cult, men are most deeply moved not by the reaching of the goal but by the grandness of the effort involved in getting there - or failing to get there.
author: Max Lerner

quote: Failures to heroic minds are the stepping stones to success.
author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quote: Achieve success in any area of life by identifying the optimum strategies and repeating them until they become habits.
author: Charles J. Givens

quote: Success consecrates the most offensive crimes.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Desire is the most important factor in the success of any athlete.
author: Bill Shoemaker

quote: Luxury is the wolf at the door and its fangs are the vanities and conceits germinated by success. When an artist learns this, he knows where the danger is.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Whether a party can have much success without a woman present I must ask others to decide, but one thing is certain, no party is any fun unless seasoned with folly.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: Success didn't spoil me, I've always been insufferable.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Success is following the pattern of life one enjoys most.
author: Al Capp

quote: The only question to ask yourself is, how much are you willing to sacrifice to achieve this success?
author: Larry Flynt

quote: There are a lot of things that go into creating success. I don't like to do just the things I like to do. I like to do things that cause the company to succeed. I don't spend a lot of time doing my favorite activities.
author: Michael Dell

quote: What material success does is provide you with the ability to concentrate on other things that really matter. And that is being able to make a difference, not only in your own life, but in other people's lives.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Whatever success I've had, I always like to top it.
author: Bernie Mac

quote: Nobody travels on the road to success without a puncture or two.
author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quote: Success is always temporary. When all is said and one, the only thing you'll have left is your character.
author: Vince Gill

quote: Success is not in never failing, but rising everytime you fall!
author: Jonathan Taylor Thomas

quote: Four years of football are calculated to breed in the average man more of the ingredients of success in life than almost any academic course he takes.
author: Knute Rockne

quote: To these ideals which were instilled in me when I was a youth, I attribute in a large degree the success that was mine on the bicycle tracks of the world.
author: Major Taylor

quote: All of us are born for a reason, but all of us don't discover why. Success in life has nothing to do with what you gain in life or accomplish for yourself. It's what you do for others.
author: Danny Thomas

quote: Currently, only 70 percent of our high school students earn diplomas with their peers, and less than one-third of our high school students graduate prepared for success in a four-year college.
author: Ruben Hinojosa

quote: The success of each of us benefits us all, and the success of us all benefits each of us individually.
author: Walter Ulbricht

quote: I believe success is preparation, because opportunity is going to knock on your door sooner or later but are you prepared to answer that?
author: Omar Epps

quote: I attribute my success to my mental approach to the game. I have always been a serious student of umpiring. I enjoy studying rules, situations, and positioning.
author: Jim Evans

quote: Well, you would have to say what is the criteria to determine the success of any merger? It would have to be that the companies are stronger financially, that they took market share, and they are on a very steady footing in terms of their performance.
author: Kevin Rollins

quote: Every success in limiting armaments is a sign that the will to achieve mutual understanding exists, and every such success thus supports the fight for international law and order.
author: Ludwig Quidde

quote: I worked half my life to be an overnight success, and still it took me by surprise.
author: Jessica Savitch

quote: Telecom is a dramatic success in India and our view is, respecting the political process, and respecting the fact that these are sovereign decisions, is that, approaching India as a friend.
author: John W. Snow

quote: Evolution acts slowly. Our psychological characteristics today are those that promoted reproductive success in the ancestral environment.
author: Keith Henson

quote: Happy people are ignoramuses and glory is nothing else but success, and to achieve it one only has to be cunning.
author: Mikhail Lermontov

quote: The secret of my success is my hairspray.
author: Richard Gere

quote: Greatness is so often a courteous synonym for great success.
author: Philip Guedalla

quote: Think of yourself as on the threshold of unparalleled success. A whole, clear, glorious life lies before you. Achieve! Achieve!
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Sudden success in golf is like the sudden acquisition of wealth. It is apt to unsettle and deteriorate the character.
author: P. G. Wodehouse

quote: To follow, without halt, one aim: that's the secret of success.
author: Anna Pavlova
